titles.title: Administrative Law Judges Retirement Act of 2005
To provide for enhanced retirement benefits for administrative law judges.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 4/26/2005--Introduced. Administrative Law Judges Retirement Act of 2005 - Sets forth separate provisions governing Government and employee contributions, annuity eligibility requirements (ten years of service and age 55), early retirement, and annuity computation (2.5 percent and 1.7 percent, respectively, of average pay for each year of service) for administrative law judges under the Civil Service Retirement System and the Federal Employees' Retirement System.
